text: The Audi A6 is an automobile produced by Audi. It replaced the Audi 100 in 1994, and entered its fourth generation in 2011. It is available in both sedan and station wagon bodystyles. It is also available in SUV bodystyle, called Audi Q7 quattro. title: Audi A6
